pages.title: We negotiate hospital bills for you | Goodbill
pages.description: We negotiate hospital bills to save you up to 100%, even if you have insurance. We find errors in your hospital bill and negotiate to save you money. BBB® Accredited with a 5-star rating.
h2_elements: Our customers love what we do.
We bet we can save you money.
Negotiating hospital bills has never been this easy.
recommendations: Shorten meta description to under 160 characters

pages.title: Unlock hidden savings with 501(r) discounts | Goodbill
pages.description: Most hospitals are required to offer discounts based on member income. Goodbill guides members through the entire process — from screening, to application, to results.
h2_elements: A 501(r) one-stop shopfor plans and members

pages.title: Supercharge your Claim Reviews for Bigger Savings | Goodbill
pages.description: Most hospital claims contain inflated charges. We use A.I., coding and clinical experts, and real visit data to catch these errors early — before the plan pays the provider.
h2_elements: How we get tothe truthon every claim.

pages.title: Member Experience | Goodbill
pages.description: Using a blend of smart automation and real human support, we create a tailored experience for every member. We know your members are your savings superpower, so we make it easy for them to drive claim savings no one else can.
h2_elements: You’re in good hands with ouraward-winning team.
